impactDescription:
Despite significant improvements in scalability and efficiency, Optimism faces certain limitations and challenges. Understanding these areas allows for a full understanding of Optimism's potential impact and areas for further development.

Optimism's security relies on the underlying Ethernet network. Any vulnerability or attack against Ethernet could affect Optimism, and strong security measures and constant monitoring are necessary to maintain the integrity of the Optimism ecosystem.

The success of Optimism depends on engaging developers and promoting the ecosystem. Providing comprehensive resources and documentation is critical to developer engagement.

contributionDescription: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. Optimism is a mental attitude characterized by hope and confidence in success and a positive future. Optimists tend to view hardships as learning experiences or temporary setbacks. Even the most miserable day holds the promise for them that “tomorrow will probably be better.” Optimists expect good things to happen, whereas pessimists instead predict unfavorable outcomes. Optimistic attitudes are linked to several benefits, including better coping skills, lower stress levels, better physical health, and higher persistence when pursuing goals
impactDescription: I'm so glad to have been given the opportunity to participate this event. The Optimism Collective is a group of companies, communities, and citizens working together to reward public goods and build a sustainable future for Ethereum. The collective aims to dispel the myth that public goods cannot be profitable by deploying a new model for rewarding those who create or sustain public goods - retroactive public goods funding (RetroPGF) - to support projects and communities building for the common good. RetroPGF is advantageous because it is relatively easy to agree on what is useful and see who built it. It is a lot harder to identify in advance what will be useful and which team will do the best job of building it.

bio: Blockchain enthusiast, sharing its potential and creating user-friendly tools.
contributionDescription: My aim is to host training sessions that showcase the practical synergy between front-end technologies, such as React.js and Next.js, and blockchain technology on the Optimism network. Through these workshops, participants will gain hands-on experience in bridging the worlds of web development and blockchain on a network known for its scalability and efficiency. I'm passionate about demystifying this innovative combination, enabling attendees to harness the potential of blockchain within their web applications. These sessions will serve as a platform for fostering understanding and proficiency in this exciting intersection of technologies, making it accessible and applicable in real-world projects.
impactDescription: My contribution involves introducing new developers to Optimism technology. This effort aims to expand the talent pool and expertise within the Optimism community, fostering growth and innovation. By nurturing and educating fresh talents, I intend to empower the collective with a stronger developer base, enabling the network to reach new heights in scalability and efficiency.

I specifically worked on rewriting the documentation for the Optimism Bridge, which is the main entry point for users to interact with Optimism. This new documentation is more clear and concise, and it includes more examples and tutorials.

bio: Web3 advocate, DAO enthusiast, and crypto educator in Cambodia
contributionDescription: I'm a web3 advocate spreading blockchain education in Cambodia through workshops, events, and a Khmer telegram channel. Over the past year I've directly taught 200+ people about the benefits of Optimistic Rollups via hands-on sessions introducing Optimistic Ethereum, wallet setup, NFT minting, and more. My workshops empower attendees to further explore web3. I also grow local communities by fostering online groups for continued learning after events. Through grassroots education and community building, I aim to drive adoption of Optimism and Ethereum scaling solutions in Cambodia. My contribution is bringing web3 knowledge to local communities who would otherwise lack awareness of its potential impact on their lives.
impactDescription: In the past year, I've educated over 200 people in Cambodia on Optimistic Rollups and web3 through interactive workshops. Attendees experience Optimism's potential hands-on, setting up wallets, minting NFTs, and learning about blockchain, dApps, DAOs, DeFi, security, contracts, and self-custody. I emphasize decentralization and financial access for the unbanked, equipping them with practical skills to begin building on Optimism. I foster continued learning through Khmer online communities, bolstering local adoption, cultivating a vibrant Optimism community, introducing web3 benefits to newcomers, and empowering attendees to create impactful decentralized solutions on Optimism. My efforts enhance diversity and inclusivity within the global Optimism community.

fundingSources.description: I self-fund web3 Education and have not received any revenue or contribution.

bio: in crypto since 2017, degen score holder
contributionDescription: We are reaching out to you with a request for a grant to realize our ambitious initiative — the creation of the "Optimism Degenset" platform. Our goal is to unite users within the "Optimism" network, providing them with opportunities to enhance their financial knowledge, participate in collaborative projects within the network, and improve their financial well-being by granting access to exclusive bonuses and privileges.
impactDescription:
The Purpose of the "Optimism Degenset" Project:

To bring together "Optimism" network members interested in improving their financial knowledge and investment skills.

To develop and launch the "Optimism Degenset" web platform, offering the following features:

Wallet Ratings: Users will be able to evaluate and compare their investment portfolios, receiving feedback from the community.

Collaborations: Mechanisms will be created to facilitate participation in joint investment projects and research.

Exclusive Bonuses: Users with high ratings will gain access to exclusive offers and bonuses from partners within the "Optimism" network.

NFT Ratings: Wallet ratings will be represented as unique NFTs, making them even more appealing to participants.

bio: anotherworld is a Chinese-style PFP NFT project.
contributionDescription:
anotherworld is a Chinese-style PFP NFT project on Optimism. The project attracts users who love Chinese elements to enter the NFT world and expand to new crypto users.

The NFT created by this project will focus on ancient characters. The characters are iterated through the changes of dynasties. Different characters reflect the condition of people in different eras, blending Chinese history into it to build an ancient Chinese world and promote the acceleration of the application of cryptocurrency in the real world.
impactDescription:
Anotherworld will create an ancient world, introducing characters from Xia, Shang, Zhou and other dynasties, and giving biographies to the characters and even surrounding physical items. Bringing antique-loving users into the crypto world.

This idea comes from a very popular movie in China this year called "Chang'an 30,000 Miles". The box office of this movie reached 250 million US dollars. After watching the movie, I immediately bought the accompanying "Chang'an 30,000 Miles" art set. I think Chinese users have demand for ancient style NFT PFP, even though the NFT market is currently in a downturn.

contributionDescription: I'm actively contributing by developing a solution to address trust concerns in crypto swapping on the Ethereum (EMV) Blockchain, encompassing platforms like Optimism. Our tool ensures secure and reliable swaps, eliminating the need for trust in counterparties and promoting a trustless environment for all users.
impactDescription: Eskrow offers a secure solution for crypto token swaps, catering to a diverse user base, including those on the Optimism blockchain. We address trust issues in asset exchanges, enabling secure and trust-free transactions. Users no longer need to rely on trust in their counterparts. Eskrow ensures both parties fulfill their commitments, eliminating the risk of one party failing to deliver. Our universal compatibility guarantees a seamless and secure exchange experience today.

contributionDescription: OP Mainnet is a fast, stable, and scalable L2 blockchain built by Ethereum developers, for Ethereum developers. Built as a minimal extension to existing Ethereum software, OP Mainnet's EVM-equivalent architecture scales your Ethereum apps without surprises. If it works on Ethereum, it works on OP Mainnet at a fraction of the cost.
impactDescription: OP Mainnet is a fast, stable, and scalable L2 blockchain built by Ethereum developers, for Ethereum developers. Built as a minimal extension to existing Ethereum software, OP Mainnet's EVM-equivalent architecture scales your Ethereum apps without surprises. If it works on Ethereum, it works on OP Mainnet at a fraction of the cost.

contributionDescription: Any communities on any chain can launch on-chain communities on Popula. Although Popula is built on NEAR protocol, which means NEAR is the DA layer. However, users can log into Popula using metamask, which means users do not need to register a NEAR wallet using third party wallet provider, Popula handles all these troubles.
impactDescription: A web3 community-led social platform would allow members to own their communities by making meaningful contributions and own the platform by helping it to reach milestones. Web2 community social platforms like Reddit provide online solutions for communities to create and interact. However, all data generated on the platform including content, activities, and social graphs do not belong to users. This lack of data ownership creates strong censorship and locks users in the moat the platform built to generate revenue for the company stakeholders. We propose a solution to address this web2 data ownership problem, as well as a novel in-community reputation system to boost contribution, foster community growth, and facilitate community management.

contributionDescription:
recently installed a Nest thermostat in my house. Nest has been around for a while, but I’ve been hesitant to get one. I won’t go into the details of why we finally pulled the trigger, but it made sense to have more control of our home environment.

When the box arrived, I was excited. I felt like I was stepping into the future. Once I got it all wired up and began the setup, though, my original hesitation came flooding back.

Nest would like to use your location.

I almost bailed. This is when Nest stopped feeling like a fun, helpful device and started to feel like an intrusive portal. Yet another keyhole for a company (or whomever else) to peer into my family’s life. It was probably okay, I rationalized. It’s probably just sharing location and temperature data, I thought to myself.
impactDescription: I wouldn’t have had this conversation with myself a decade ago. As the internet grew and the iPhone came on the scene, it was exciting. I felt a reverence, almost gratitude for everything it enabled. Driven by curiosity and optimism, I signed up for any new service just to see what the future might hold. I was on the leading edge of early adopters.

bio: web3 moderator, collab manager, defi , nft mogul
contributionDescription: Social contagion research suggests that individual decision making is shaped by collective, social processes. We extend the entrepreneurial optimism literature by arguing that collective optimism—the shared, positive expectations about future outcomes—is salient to key entrepreneurial outcomes. We test our position by examining how fluctuations in U.S. collective entrepreneurial optimism influence venture creation and growth using 1993–2010 NFIB entrepreneurial optimism data. Results indicate that collective entrepreneurial optimism exhibits a curvilinear relationship with venture creation and growth, which is moderated by environmental dynamism. We validate the NFIB measure by constructing an alternative measure of collective entrepreneurial optimism using media reports.

contributionDescription: Optimism is a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. Optimism aims to improve scalability and reduce transaction fees on the Ethereum network, enabling faster and more cost-effective decentralized applications. It utilizes Optimistic Rollups, a technology that increases transaction throughput by batching multiple transactions together and validating them off-chain, while ensuring the same level of security as the Ethereum mainnet. By reducing congestion and increasing efficiency, Optimism contributes to a more inclusive and sustainable Ethereum ecosystem. If you have specific questions about Optimism, I'd be happy to help!

impactDescription: Retroactive Public Goods Funding (RetroPGF) is a mechanism that rewards people and projects for the positive impact they have on the Optimism Collective beyond the profit that they already receive. RetroPGF attempts to balance the equation impact=profit. If you're creating value for the Collective that isn't already being rewarded (e.g., via a sustainable business model), the Collective will do its best to fill the gap through its regular RetroPGF rounds.

contributionDescription:
OP Mainnet is a low-cost and lightning-fast Ethereum L2 blockchain. Fast, stable, scalable Ethereum.
OP Mainnet is a fast, stable, and scalable L2 blockchain built by Ethereum developers, for Ethereum developers. Built as a minimal extension to existing Ethereum software, OP Mainnet's EVM-equivalent architecture scales your Ethereum apps without surprises. If it works on Ethereum, it works on OP Mainnet at a fraction of the cost.

The Superchain token list is a list of tokens managed by the maintainers of this repo that have been deployed on Superchains including the OP Mainnet and Base. It serves as a source of truth for services such as the Optimism bridge UI.

It is worth noting that the Superchain Token List makes a distinction between token deployment / bridging and list curation. Tokens can be deployed / bridged in a permissionless manner, anyone can deploy / bridge a token on the Superchain.

Please note that by adding a token to the list we aren’t making any claims about the token itself; tokens are not reviewed for their quality, merits, or soundness as investments.

bio: Hi! My name is Ben, and I manage a crypto marketing agency called Amaretto Labs.
contributionDescription:
Hello! 

During my time working with a DAO called ICHI, my team and I created content describing the benefits of Layer 2s, primarily Optimism. We created educational blog articles and videos that tell people why they need layer 2s, how Optimism builds with the public good in mind, and is cheaper than Ethereum, all while maintaining great levels of security! We think that educating the public on the various solutions in crypto will make the world a better place, and we are so happy to have included Optimism in a few of our pieces of content.

bio: Preparing Peruvian youth for the future of work through tech skills.
contributionDescription:
AYNITEC is an educational initiative that encompasses two programs, AYNITEC JUNIOR and KIDS, educating children between the ages of 8 and 16. Our mission is to empower future generations with essential technological and programming skills in the digital age.
-Organized events and workshops on RetroPGF for children and youth in Peru through the AYNITEC program, providing live classes online. These events and workshops were taught by AYNITEC volunteers.
-Awarded certificates to volunteers who completed the AYNITEC program using the Optimism unlock protocol application. The purpose of awarding the blockchain certificate was to give them the traceability and verification of their volunteer contribution, as well as to insert them the curiosity to learn about web3 and optimism.

contributionLinks.description: This landingpage is about the project.

impactDescription:
AYNITEC, with the support of Optimismo, organized events and workshops for children and young people in Peru.
As a collective, we promote the use of certificate unlockprotocol and mirror protocols to showcase our work through blogs.
This initiative had a significant impact on the participants, who learned the fundamentals of technology, web3 and Optimism. Likewise, using the Zora platform allowed us to share the work of our aynicinos in the creation of NFTs.  In the future, we plan to continue using web3 technology to educate children and youth in Peru
The influence of optimism on children and young people has been notable, providing them with invaluable access to educational resources and opportunities.

bio: This is a research project to use WebAuthn with Account Abstraction.
contributionDescription:
The goal of the project is to simplify the user onboarding flow by combining the web standard - WebAuthn (FaceID/Fingerprint Authentication) with Account Abstraction (ERC-4337).

Installing a chrome extension, or a mobile app to use a wallet is a big blocker for user onboarding. Instead, we should use modern standards like WebAuthn, Account Abstraction and create a SDK, which can be integrated into any website in a few lines of code.

WebAuthn is already available in all major browsers, including mobile browsers, like Safari on iOS and Chrome on Android. There is no approval necessary from authorities (Apple, Google, etc.) to use this new approach.

Users don't need to know anything about blockchain to do the onboarding using this approach.

contributionLinks.description: Demo for the new user onboarding flow
Account Factory Contract for Account Abstraction (ERC-4337)

impactDescription:
I don't have any past contributions on the Optimism Collective.
However, this new approach of onboarding users will help engineers to onboard millions of users without any friction. We are preparing an SDK + Contracts, which can be integrated easily into any website and onboard users instantly.

bio: Dune Analytics Alternative. 100% Open source. 90% Cheaper than Dune.
contributionDescription:
We streamline the process of launching analytics dashboards based on on-chain data, decoupling users from Dune Analytics. 

We offer an alternative way to host your own data pipeline, without the need for specialized data engineer knowledge. 

This means that new chains and roll-ups can have an analytics platform from day zero. There's no longer any need to wait for Dune to sync your network. 

This approach could expedite the creation of new dashboards and enhance transparency for new roll-ups.
impactDescription:
We empower people to analyze on-chain data using their own infrastructure and ease the process of setting up a data pipeline, even without any data engineering knowledge. To further lower the entry barriers, we've integrated a text-to-SQL feature, reducing the need for SQL fluency to query over on-chain data.

This could potentially boost blockchain engagement and adoption by both individuals and enterprises.

bio: addrs is free a tool to replace addresses with a one tap web2 payment UX.
contributionDescription:
Weve developed a platform that allows users to create payment profiles containing all of their crypto addresses in one place with web2 payment UX. Fully non-custodial and free.

What is addrs?
addrs is a platform that allows users to create payment profiles containing all of their cryptocurrency addresses in one place, making it easier to send and receive cryptocurrency. When someone clicks on the link, their wallet will open with your address automatically entered, eliminating the need to manually input long addresses. Any ETH wallet. addrs is a non-custodial platform, meaning that we do not hold onto your cryptocurrency or private keys. This gives users full control over their assets and adds an extra layer of security. We support OP on Optimism aswell as OPETH AND stables.
impactDescription:
In addition to the convenient link-based system for sending and receiving cryptocurrency, addrs also offers the ability to receive crypto using a Visa/MC/Bank and have it deposited directly into their wallet without the need for a custodial account. This allows for Optimism to be used to onramp payments

You can also easily embed addrs directly into your site using our optimized embed.addrs.to embeds. Just plug and play and itll handle the rest. This allows for anyone to accept Crypto payments with a simple UX.

bio: decentralized cloud rental for web3 and multisender app based on uniswap permit2
contributionDescription:
Our applications Aikisend and Aikicloud are deployed to work on optimism,
First Aikisend allows OP users to now trustlessly multisend any ERC-20 tokens, all in a single transaction by leveraging the state of the art permit2 library from uniswap.
Also we've built Aikicloud which is a cloud service rental model based on the ERC-4907 NFT rental standard.
impactDescription:
Our application AikiSend had contributed to unifying the Defi ecosystem on optimism, by leveraging token permission routed through uniswap permit2 library, this allows for a more transparent and seamless on-chain transaction for batched multisend and transfers of different tokens in one transaction, saving gas and time for end-user.
AikiCloud cloud server rental platform can now allow Optimism users to have access to powerful web2 cloud infrastructure, all from their web3 wallet without having to go through the hassle of setting up a web2 payment gateway or KYC etc. This helps drive user adoption for Optimism Collective and we continue to increase the services we currently support.

bio: The DAO for Builders from KIT Alumnis
contributionDescription: We unite KIT alumni who are already deeply involved in the blockchain industry and have rich experience in the industry and practical experience in projects. Through the regular internal events of KITKryptoDAO (e.g. Saturday Crypto Meetings, which has been successfully held for 4 consecutive weeks), we provide members who do not yet have sufficient knowledge and practical experience with the opportunities for theoretical learning and knowledge exchanges, technical practice (e.g. Solidity Live Coding, which is in the process of being organized), and in-depth understanding of blockchain-related industries. We use OP Mainnet as well as Testnet for our practices and Live Coding events, and our DAO initiator Zion Zhan is a experienced OP Stack developer and core team member of Orderly Network.
impactDescription: By contributing as described above, we become an evangelist for the OP Stack and related knowledge, and cultivate more forward-thinking and solid hands-on experience for the OP Collective and the OP ecosystem with well-educated and technically inclined developers from KIT alumnis.

bio: Local Bloom hubs build food security, relationship repair, and local economies.
contributionDescription: Bloom Network, in collaboration with Inverter Network, developed a regenerative action bounties system that rewards grassroots participants for doing real world climate actions. Bounty claims are reviewed by an approved regional verifier who has relationships with people on the ground, and tokens are then automatically issued. This on-chain system can integrate with other impact certification tools such as Hypercerts, to boost visibility of local economic sovereignty work to potential funders and supporters. Bloom designed a token engineering model so tokens can additionally be used as a community currency to circulate forms of surplus in cash-poor communities. Grants and profits from Bloom’s social network can flow into local small scale impact projects, in a trusted, transparent way.

bio: Lorak is an innovative scalable onchain game on Base, using the 6551-eip.
contributionDescription:
Lorak is live on Mainnet, since the launch of Base, and since has processed over 450k+ TXs in total. We believe that it is now one of the largest onchain games on Optimism overall. Furthermore our development acts as a blueprint for other onchain games to emerge on Optimism. 

Lorak innovates with in-game state on-chain, experimentation in asset ownership, specifically using 6551-eip in our game we've been able to implement ownership of in-game items tied to the in-game character NFT. Which allowed for an RPG type game to thrive with over 300+ NFTs to find as loot.

Behind Lorak is LandTorn is a gaming hub built on Optimisim Base, acting as a publisher and distributor of games with a focus on on-chain innovation. We are helping other onchain games build towards a future on Optimism.
impactDescription:
Lorak's impact has been felt through over 80k+ In-game character NFTs minted, over 10K unique players interfacing with our game. 410,000+ transactions processed through our contracts. Lorak, part of onchain summer on Base, is an experimental on-chain idle game built using the ERC-6551 standard, testing the limits of Token Bound accounts.

Built a new community of game enjoyers on Optimism-Base of over 3K people. 

We believe our impact is not only in the growth and showcase of a successful large scale onchain game, but also in the form of building a community of like-minded people and developers interested in onchain games. Through Landtorn we are building a whole ecosystem of onchain games on Optimism-Base and support their growth with our findings in game development & blueprints.

contributionDescription: All cryptocurrency transactions are recorded in one large virtual network called the blockchain. The blockchain can be visualized as an infinite chain that consists of individual blocks. The blocks, in turn, store information about all transactions made in the cryptocurrency market. Thus, the blockchain is made up of individual nodes, behind which users or groups of users are hidden.

bio: Tokenized, Tradeable wagers for any event imaginable
contributionDescription:
We developed and launched a Tokenized, Tradeable Wager platform on the Optimism network. This platform revolutionizes the conventional wagering system by introducing tokenized bets. Users can place wagers and receive tokens for each side. These tokens are not just placeholders but tradeable assets, creating an entirely new dynamic and market around betting.

By choosing the Optimism network for our platform, we have expanded its ecosystem, inviting a new class of users – bettors, traders, and gaming enthusiasts – to experience the advantages of Optimism, like lower fees and faster transactions.

impactDescription:
By introducing our Tokenized, Tradeable Wager platform on Optimism, we brought a fresh wave of users to the Optimism network.

bio: Ducky City is a metaverse, socialfi project built on multi-chain
contributionDescription:
We are in the process of development, and currently, we have implemented support for connecting and logging in to our metaverse system using the OP network.

Here's a brief introduction to our business model:

Premium: The packages in the metaverse include various types such as Verification, VIP 1, VIP 2, etc. Users need to pay to upgrade to premium. 
Skins:
There will be special and limited skins and users will have to pay to own them.
Celebrity space: Celebrities can create private spaces to meet with fans, and users must have a "KEY" to enter the space. 
Online office: Users need to pay to use the online office.

We will use the OP network to carry out all transactions in our business model.

bio: Building Fast and reliable crypto transfers across networks.
contributionDescription:
hi 
in breef i built this smart contract on base blockchain to contribute to optimisme ecosystem by providing :
1) Automated Trading Strategies:
Developers can build automated trading strategies using this contract. For example, they can program it to perform specific trades under certain conditions or market events.
Integrations with DeFi Platforms:
This contract could be integrated into a larger decentralized finance (DeFi) platform. It could serve as a component for users to execute trades within the platform.  
2) Liquidity Provision:
The contract could be used to provide liquidity to Uniswap v3 pools. Liquidity providers can utilize the functions to efficiently manage their positions.
3) Arbitrage Opportunities 4) Customized Trading Logic 5) gas efficiency.

contributionLinks.description: providing operations functions to interact on Uniswap v3 pools.

impactDescription:
The introduction of this smart contract on the Optimism network has several significant impacts on the Optimism Collective. It brings increased efficiency and cost savings, reducing transaction costs for users. This makes DeFi activities more accessible and appealing. Developers now have a powerful tool to create automated trading strategies, integrate with DeFi platforms, provide liquidity, and explore arbitrage opportunities. This expands the range of applications within the ecosystem.
The contract's ability to provide liquidity to Uniswap v3 pools enhances overall trading experiences, reducing slippage. Customizable trading logic allows for innovation in DeFi strategies, tailoring solutions to specific market conditions.

contributionDescription:
Optimism is a layer 2 chain, meaning it functions on top of Ethereum mainnet (layer 1). Transactions take place on Optimism, but the data about transactions get posted to mainnet where they are validated. It’s like driving in a less crowded side street while benefiting from the security of a highway.
Optimism is the second-largest Ethereum layer 2 with a total of $313 million locked into its smart contracts, as of this writing, according to Defi Llama. Arbitrum comes first with $1.32 billion.

Its EVM-equivalent architecture ensures seamless scalability for Ethereum applications. I believe this is the future!

As an early recipient of the OP Airdrop from my work with Constitution DAO, I believe I should be considered for the RetroPGF for the following reasons:

+ I'm well-versed and passionate about the Superchain thesis and the OP Collective.
+ With 14+ years as a tech builder in Asia, I can leverage my credibility to bridge the Web2 to Web3 transition and champion the OP Superchain thesis effectively.
+ As an early BASE L2 contributor within Coinbase, I've been actively promoting the "Superchain Thesis."
+ I'm transitioning to an independent role outside of Coinbase, where I'll support the BASE Ecosystem and continue advocating for the OP-Stack & Superchain narrative.

contributionLinks.description: Active monitoring for DAO in BASE L2, part of BASED DAO
Early BASE builder sign #48 on OP Stack
One of my work in Korea (with BASE) supporting OP Roll up and BASE

impactDescription:
My contributions have amplified OP Collective strengthened its community, laying a foundation
1/ Superchain Thesis Promotion: Elevated awareness of OP Collective's goals, enhancing community engagement. Strengthened shared vision and enthusiasm within the collective.
2/ Web2 to Web3 Transition: Utilizing my tech expertise, I've introduced several Web2 professionals to Web3, enriching our community. My reputation amplifies trust and respect for OP Collective.
3/ Advocacy, as Coinbase : As an early BASE L2 contributor, I've championed OP Collective, sparking interest from a crypto giant and elevating our credibility in the industry.
4/ Future Support: My shift to an independent role ensures continued support for BASE & OP-Stack, opening doors for potential collaborations and a broader ecos.

bio: Dreamer, artist envisioning twin flame life, exploring for hope in a creativity.
contributionDescription: As a free-spirited hippie, traveler, and dreamer, my unique journey intersects with the Optimism network. It's essential to mention that I am on the autism spectrum, and I find solace and effective communication primarily through the internet. Within this digital realm, I've forged a vision of existence shared with a twin flame in a rustic cabin, while embarking on a transformative exploration of the crypto landscape. Through my contributions to Optimism, I strive to cultivate hope for a new, creative, and open community on this new earth we collectively envision. My role within this network is not only technical but also deeply philosophical, driven by a desire to foster a harmonious existence that transcends the boundaries of traditional systems.
impactDescription: I'm relatively new to the crypto scene, so I'm not a seasoned pro. Nonetheless, my contributions to Optimism have positively impacted the end user experience and adoption within the Collective. I've focused on making the platform more user-friendly and accessible, particularly for individuals like myself on the autism spectrum.In addition, my efforts in building a welcoming community have helped introduce newcomers to the Optimism Collective. By creating an inclusive environment, I've contributed to expanding the user base and making Optimism more inviting to a wider audience.In summary, while I may not be a crypto expert, my work has made a difference in improving the user experience and bringing new users into the fold at Optimism.

contributionDescription:
活跃项目用户的 Optimism 用户，四个针对 L1 以太坊，针对积极贡献、正和行为和积极参与。积​​极参与的治理对于扩展去中心化系统至关重要。符合此标准的地址已积极选择通过参与治理来积极贡献。以太坊上 dapp 的活跃用户对生态系统的发展至关重要。由于高额费用，其中许多地址已开始与其他链桥接，我们希望帮助将它们保留在以太坊生态系统中，同时奖励他们的好奇心和探索。Optimism 的空投也经过校准以奖励对以太坊的忠诚度，因此完全放弃以太坊的用户将不会收到空投。

标准：地址桥接到另一条链，但在它们桥接后的每个月仍然在以太坊上进行应用程序交易，并且从那时起以平均每周至少 2 次的速度进行交易（匹配地址的前 60%）。

桥梁包括 TVL 的顶级 L1：Terra、BSC、Fantom、Avalanche、Solana、Polygon；和通用 L2：Arbtirum、Optimism、Metis、Boba。
为了确保我们有足够长的时间来采样活动，地址必须在快照前至少 90 天从以太坊桥接。

bio: Tally is an onchain governance app for Ethereum ecosystem
contributionDescription: Tally made several impactful contributions to the Optimism Collective over the past year, including developing a delegate portal, producing an in-depth technical research report on Superchain governance, and facilitating Delegation Week (an ecosystem-wide event focused on governance participation). Tally also built an L2 governance voting protocol on Optimism called Rollcall in early 2022.

contributionLinks.description: Optimism Collective Mission: Superchain Governance Research Report
Rollcall, an L2 governance voting protocol on Optimism
5-day ecosystem-wide event dedicated to DAO governance engagement

impactDescription:
Tally's contributions have made Optimism Collective governance accessible and future-proof. 

Accessible:
- Tally's Optimism delegate portal makes it easy to discover and track the performance of Token House delegates. 
- Delegation Week re-engaged OP token holders with Optimism Collective governance and elevated the voices of Token House delegates. 

Future-proof:
- Tally's Superchain Governance Deep Dive Mission produced the most complete and up-to-date analysis of the state of crosschain governance. We deeply investigated and produced documentation around all of the viable paths for expanding Token House governance across the Superchain and ultimately recommended a zk-SNARK based approach that scales to thousands of chains and millions of users.

contributionDescription: Currently, the Optimism Foundation runs the sole sequencer on OP Mainnet. This does not mean that Optimism can censor user transactions. However, it is still desirable to decentralize the sequencer over time, eliminating Optimism's role entirely so that anyone can participate in the network as a block producer.
impactDescription: As part of the OVM 2.0 upgrade, the Optimism fault proof mechanism had to be temporarily disabled. This means that users of the OP Mainnet network currently need to trust the Sequencer node (run by Optimism Foundation) to publish valid state roots to Ethereum. You can read more about our security model

bio: A Dune dashboard that presents data on the adoption of ERC4337 Smart Accounts
contributionDescription:
𝗧𝗟𝗗𝗥
Built a Dune dashboard on ERC4337 Smart Accounts. Provides valuable insight for teams building smart account infrastructure.

𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻
This dashboard breaks down 
- Overview statistics  (accounts deployed, monthly transactions .etc)
- Bundler Performance (marketshare, revenue .etc)
- Paymaster activity (marketshare, gas spend .etc)
- Application usage by ERC4337 accounts 

It is currently the most popular Dune dashboard for ERC4337 with 410+ stars.

contributionDescription:
Contributions to an optimism network are actions and efforts made to foster and promote a positive and hopeful outlook within a broader community or group of individuals. Here's how you might describe your contributions to an optimism network:

Positive Content Creation: You actively create and share positive content on social media, blogs, or other platforms. This content may include inspirational quotes, uplifting stories, or tips for maintaining a positive mindset.

Supportive Community Building: You work to build and nurture a community of like-minded individuals who share the goal of spreading optimism. This might involve organizing events, forums, or online groups where people can come together to share their experiences and support each other.
impactDescription:
Contributions to an "optimism collective crypto" likely refer to your involvement and efforts in a cryptocurrency community or project that is focused on promoting optimism, positivity, and constructive engagement within the cryptocurrency space. Here's how you might describe your contributions to such a collective:

Positive Engagement: You actively participate in discussions and interactions within the cryptocurrency community, promoting a positive and respectful tone in online forums, social media groups, and chat channels. Your contributions aim to create a more welcoming and supportive environment for newcomers and experienced participants alike.

contributionDescription:
1.Community Building and Engagement: I believe in fostering a vibrant and inclusive community. I plan to actively engage in discussions, forums, and social media channels, and offer support and knowledge-sharing to fellow community members.
2.Collaborative Initiatives: I am keen on collaborating with other community members and projects to amplify our collective impact and drive innovation.
3.Respect and Mentorship: I am committed to fostering a respectful and inclusive environment, and I am open to mentoring newer contributors to help them navigate the complexities of the project.
4.Staying Informed and Adaptive: I understand the importance of aligning contributions with the project's evolving needs and priorities and am committed to staying informed about the project's roadmap.

contributionDescription:
We're a DAO accelerator for patient communities, and we've crafted two tools on Optimism:

Token Vesting Contract: It allows bounties for patient contributors, ensuring long-term commitment while granting immediate voting rights. This promotes genuine community participation over speculation.

NFT Badges via Otterspace: To meet Swiss regulations, we issue NFT badges post KYC/AML checks for contributions over 1,000 Swiss Francs. The NFTs, with embedded metadata, ensure contributors are verified, making the donation process seamless and compliant.

Your support can amplify our community-driven mission.

contributionLinks.description: Example vesting contract for hair loss patient community.

impactDescription:
At our DAO accelerator for patient communities, our contributions on Optimism have been twofold:

Token Vesting Contract: Deployed on Optimism, this not only saved costs but also optimized transaction speeds. It promotes genuine, long-term community involvement by providing immediate voting rights to contributors, aligning with Optimism's ethos of community empowerment.

NFT Badges via Otterspace: To streamline the compliance process, we used Optimism for efficient NFT minting, ensuring that sizable contributions remain transparent and trustworthy. This approach has showcased Optimism’s potential in regulatory use-cases, further diversifying its applicability.

Our efforts aim to enhance Optimism's community-centric vision.
